paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 gene variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Twelve patients (6.25%) carried PGV in six genes associated with pancreatic cancer, i.e., ATM, BRCA1, BRCA2, CDKN2A, MSH2 and PALB2.

variants.additional_notes: Only one variant in BRCA2 was reported.
key_quotes: Twelve patients (6.25%) carried PGV in six genes associated with pancreatic cancer, i.e., ATM, BRCA1, BRCA2, CDKN2A, MSH2 and PALB2.

tables_processed.table_caption: Variants in genes associated with pancreatic cancer.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extraction was straightforward as only one BRCA2 variant was reported.
